org.apache.soap
Class Fault

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.apache.soap.Fault
public class Fault
extends java.lang.Object

A Fault object represents the contents and semantics of a <SOAP-ENV:Fault> element.

Author:
Matthew J. Duftler (duftler@us.ibm.com), Sanjiva Weerawarana (sanjiva@watson.ibm.com), Eric M. Dashofy (edashofy@ics.uci.edu), Kevin J. Mitchell (kevin.mitchell@xmls.com)
